content:
# The extraction of iron plates was successful, but I encountered an error indicating that I do not have enough wood to craft the burner mining drill. 
# It appears that I only have 5 units of stone and 5 units of iron ore, but no wood left in my inventory.

# To resolve this, I need to gather more wood. 
# I will locate a nearby tree and harvest some wood to ensure I have enough for crafting.

wood_position = nearest(Resource.Wood)
move_to(wood_position)  # Moving to the wood position
harvest_resource(wood_position, quantity=5)  # Harvesting wood
print(f"Inventory after gathering wood: {inspect_inventory()}")
